title.narrative: Second Economic Recovery Development Policy Loan

description.narrative: This development policy loan supports the Government of Croatia's reform efforts with the aim to: (i) enhance fiscal sustainabilitythrough expenditure-based consolidation; and (ii) strengthen investment climate.
